[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] 瑜伽
completely get rid of sth. that is unnecessary or unwanted 消除；根除
column3: e.g. There is no solution that will totally [[eliminate]] the possibility of theft.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 1) the practice of limiting your interests or activities to one particular subject 专业化；专门化
column3: e.g. Increased [[specialization]] has reduced the number of doctors who are good at managing emergencies.；e.g. His [[specialization]] in translation led him to start his own company.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 2) an activity or subject that you know a lot about 专业
column3: e.g. Increased [[specialization]] has reduced the number of doctors who are good at managing emergencies.；e.g. His [[specialization]] in translation led him to start his own company.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: if you routinize a way of doing sth., you make it a normal part of a job or process 使惯例化；使成常规
column3: e.g. To improve efficiency, [[routinize]] as much of your morning as possible.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: start using computers and machines to do a job, rather than people 使自动化
column3: e.g. Massive investment is needed to [[automate]] the production process.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] (disc jockey) sb. who plays records on a radio show or in a club where you can dance （电台）音乐唱片节目主持人；（俱乐部）打碟师，舞曲唱片播放员
as a result 结果；因此；所以
column3: e.g. The company is trying to reduce its costs; [[consequently]], staff who leave are not being replaced.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: judge how good, useful, or successful sth. is 评估；评价
column3: e.g. It can be difficult to [[evaluate]] the effectiveness of different medical treatments.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] (technical) 演算法；计算程序
make sb. think and behave exactly as you want them to, by skillfully deceiving or influencing them 操纵，控制（某人的思想和行为）
column3: e.g. As a politician, he knows how to [[manipulate]] public opinion.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: (also mystic) (usu. before noun) having spiritual powers or qualities that are difficult to understand or to explain 神秘的；不可思议的；难以解释的
column3: e.g. Watching the sun rise over the mountain was an almost [[mystical]] experience.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: connected with the chemistry of living things 生物化学的
column3: e.g. People can become addicted to the [[biochemical]] changes brought about by vigorous exercise.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: (usu. before noun) using measurements of human features, such as fingers or eyes, in order to identify people 生物特征识别的
column3: e.g. The major [[biometric]] methods include face, voice, and fingerprint recognition.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 1) guess sth. using as many facts as you can find 预测；估计
column3: e.g. Researchers [[calculated]] that this group was at a higher risk of heart disease.；e.g. You should [[calculate]] how much time this assignment will take before you start doing it.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 2) find out how much sth. will cost, how long sth. will take, etc., by using numbers 计算；核算
column3: e.g. Researchers [[calculated]] that this group was at a higher risk of heart disease.；e.g. You should [[calculate]] how much time this assignment will take before you start doing it.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C, U] a careful examination of sth. in order to understand it better （对事物的）分析
column3: e.g. At the meeting, they presented a detailed [[analysis]] of 12 schools in London.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 1) the information produced by a computer （计算机的）输出信息
column3: e.g. You run the software, you look at the [[output]], and then you make modifications (修改).；e.g. Government statistics show the largest drop in industrial [[output]] for 10 years.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 2) the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory, etc. 产量；产品
column3: e.g. You run the software, you look at the [[output]], and then you make modifications (修改).；e.g. Government statistics show the largest drop in industrial [[output]] for 10 years.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: make sth. so that it is exactly right for sb.'s particular needs or for a particular purpose 根据特定需要制作；定做
column3: e.g. Most travel agents are willing to [[tailor]] travel arrangements to meet individual requirements.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] a feeling of extreme unhappiness 忧虑；苦恼；悲伤
column3: e.g. Luke's poor academic performance caused his parents great [[distress]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] a tune, esp. the main tune in a piece of music written for several instruments or voices 旋律；曲调；（尤指）主旋律
column3: e.g. They played some lovely [[melodies]] at the end of the concert.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] sth. that is a feature of only one particular place, person, situation, etc. （某地方、某人或某情况等的）特点，独特性
column3: e.g. A sharp ringing in the ears is a [[peculiarity]] of the disease.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] 催产素
1) write a piece of music 作（曲）
column3: e.g. Mozart [[composed]] his last opera shortly before he passed away.；e.g. The committee is [[composed]] of doctors, nurses and members of the public.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 2) (be composed of) be formed from a number of substances, parts, or people 由···组成
column3: e.g. Mozart [[composed]] his last opera shortly before he passed away.；e.g. The committee is [[composed]] of doctors, nurses and members of the public.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: adapted to personal requirements or tastes 个性化的
column3: e.g. His car has a [[personalized]] number plate.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: apart from sb.  sth. 除···之外（还）
column3: e.g. I've got no family [[besides]] my parents.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: be even better or greater than sb. / sth. else 超过；胜过

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: be more successful than sb. / sth. else 做得比···好；胜过

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: the type of work sb. does 专业；行业
column3: e.g. You can expect to meet some very interesting people in my [[line of work]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: later in the future, not immediately 从长远来看
column3: e.g. It seems a lot of effort but I'm sure it's the best solution [[in the long run]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: used to emphasize that sb. has human feelings or weaknesses, often when contrasting them with machines 血肉之躯
column3: e.g. I am only [[flesh and blood]], like anyone else.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: search or examine sth. very carefully 仔细搜查（检查）某物
column3: e.g. [[Go over]] your work before you hand it in.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: (esp. AmE) realize and understand sth. such as your feelings and attitudes 认识到某事物，了解某事物（如自己的情感、态度等）
column3: e.g. I am finally able to [[get in touch with]] who I am.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: become less sad, or make sb. feel less sad （使）高兴起来；（使）振作起来
column3: e.g. Here is a bit of news that will [[cheer up]] you.

robotics: sb.'s heart skips / misses a beat
[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: used to say sb. suddenly feels a moment of fear, excitement, etc. 某人心跳停顿了一下（表示突然感到惊恐、兴奋等）
column3: e.g. My heart [[skipped a beat]] when I saw who it was.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: remove sth. when you are preparing a book, a piece of film, etc. for printing or broadcasting （在编辑、剪辑等过程中）删除，去掉
column3: e.g. Anything offensive will be [[edited out]] at a later stage of the production.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: use a feeling, fact, or idea in order to get what you want, often in an unfair way 利用（某一感情、事实或观点）
column3: e.g. The advertisement [[plays on]] our emotions, showing a doctor holding a newborn baby.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: become popular and fashionable 流行
column3: e.g. The idea of glasses being a fashion item has been slow to [[catch on]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: be likely to be able to do sth. or to succeed 有机会 / 有希望（做某事）
column3: e.g. She will [[stand a chance]] of passing the exam if she works hard.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: rational thoughts, decisions, etc. are based on reasons rather than emotions （想法、决定等）合理的，基于理性的
column3: e.g. Parents need to be fully informed before they can make a [[rational]] decision.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: relating to the natural processes performed by living things 生物的；与生物有关的
column3: e.g. Breathing and sleeping are examples of [[biological]] rhythms in humans.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: relating to genes or genetics 基因的；遗传学的

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] an extremely small living thing which can only be seen if you use a microscope. Some microbes can cause diseases. 微生物
column3: e.g. Was it not the duty of the doctor to kill the [[microbes]]?

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: very silly or unreasonable 愚蠢的；荒唐的；可笑的
column3: e.g. It's [[ridiculous]] that we have to wait two weeks for the operation.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: in a way that is based on feelings rather than facts or proof 基于直觉地

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: in a way that shows you are happy or pleased to do sth. or that you do not object to doing sth. 欣然地；愿意地；乐意地
column3: e.g. Sixty percent of voters said they would [[willingly]] pay higher taxes for better health care.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] 西兰花
move your body quickly away from sb. / sth. because you find them or it frightening or unpleasant 退缩；畏缩

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] a feeling of great shock, fear, or disgust 震惊；惊恐；厌恶
column3: e.g. The thought of being left alone filled her with [[horror]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] a feeling that sb. / sth. is unpleasant or morally offensive 不喜欢；厌恶；反感

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C, U] a difference between similar things, or a change from the usual amount or form of sth. （相似物体之间的）差异；（数量或形式的）变化，变动
column3: e.g. There might be striking [[variations]] within a species.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C, usu. pl.] 味蕾
[C] a nerve ending which receives information about changes in light, heat, etc. and causes the body to react in particular ways 感受器；受体

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] 硫脲
more than enough in quantity 丰富的；充足的

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] (deoxyribonucleic acid) 脱氧核糖核酸
extremely unpleasant and making you feel sick 令人恶心的；使人极其反感的；令人厌恶的
column3: e.g. The kitchen was in a [[disgusting]] state when she left.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: fair, practical, and sensible 有道理的；合情合理的

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: reduce sb.'s pain or unpleasant feelings 减轻；缓解（疼痛或不快的感觉）

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: feeling happy because you are no longer worried about sth. 宽慰的；放心的
column3: e.g. She looked immensely [[relieved]] when she heard the news.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: an innate quality or ability is sth. you are born with （素质或能力）天生的，与生俱来的

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 1) sexually attractive 性感迷人的

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 2) (fml.) sth. that is desirable is worth having or doing 理想的；值得拥有的；值得做的
column3: e.g. He was with the young woman whom his classmates thought most [[desirable]].；e.g. The ability to speak a foreign language is highly [[desirable]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: (esp. of a woman or part of her body) having an attractive or well-proportioned shape （尤指女子或其部分身体）好看的，匀称的
column3: e.g. She was about my age and had long, [[shapely]] legs and a beautiful smile.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: shining and flashing with light 闪亮的；闪光的
column3: e.g. This is a region of [[sparkling]] lakes, rushing streams, and dense forests.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: very pleasing in appearance or sound 好看的；好听的；有吸引力的
column3: e.g. I thought he was very [[attractive]] and obviously very intelligent.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: relating to the way in which plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time 进化的
column3: e.g. Some scholars are keen to see [[evolutionary]] theory challenged in university lecture halls.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: if an animal or plant reproduces, or reproduces itself, it produces young plants or animals 生殖；繁殖

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: relating to being a parent and esp. to being responsible for a child's safety and development 父亲的；母亲的；父母的

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] (pl. offspring) sb.'s child or children — often used humorously （某人的）子女，子孙，后代（常为幽默用法）
column3: e.g. Tom's sister came over on Saturday with all her [[offspring]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] a lack of interest 无兴趣
column3: e.g. The exception to Tom’s [[disinterest]] in social issues was education.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] 器官
making you lose hope and determination 令人灰心的；令人气馁的
column3: e.g. It is [[disheartening]] to see what little progress has been made.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: (not before noun) seeming certain to happen at some time in the future 注定的；必然的
column3: e.g. He feels that he is [[destined]] to become a musician, just like his father.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: 1) (be a ~ of / to sth.) be so strongly influenced by sth. that you cannot make your own decisions — used to show disapproval 成为某事物的奴隶，完全受某事物控制（含贬义）

column3: e.g. How can she not see that she has become a [[slave]] of fashion?；e.g. By the time I was 10, I had become her [[slave]], doing all the housework.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: extremely attractive and impressive; deserving praise 壮丽的；宏伟的；值得赞扬的
column3: e.g. I think he deserves congratulations for a [[magnificent]] job well done.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: deal with a problem or improve a bad situation 解决；补救；纠正；改善
column3: e.g. To [[remedy]] the situation, the water must be chemically treated.；e.g. There is no simple [[remedy]] for unemployment.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [C] a way of dealing with a problem or making a bad situation better （问题的）解决方式；（糟糕状况的）补救方法
column3: e.g. To [[remedy]] the situation, the water must be chemically treated.；e.g. There is no simple [[remedy]] for unemployment.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: [U] a strong feeling of sympathy for sb. who is suffering, and a desire to help them 怜悯；同情
column3: e.g. He was filled with overwhelming love and [[compassion]] for his wife.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: if sth. makes sense, there seems to be a good reason or explanation for it 解释得通；有道理
column3: e.g. Why did she do a thing like that? It doesn't seem to [[make sense]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: try to find out about sth. unknown or secret 探究；探寻
column3: e.g. When you [[dig into]] the data a bit though, things look gloomier.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: have an idea or discover sth. suddenly or unexpectedly 突然想出（主意）；无意中发现（某事）
column3: e.g. When we first [[hit upon]] the idea, everyone told us it would never work.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: start to love sb. very much 爱上某人

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: concerning sb. / sth. 关于某事
column3: e.g. Frank was very uncertain [[as to]] whether it was the right job for him.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: very unhappy because sb. has sth. that you want 十分忌妒的；眼红的
column3: e.g. Chad is heading off to Spain for the week, and I'm [[green with envy]].

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: start doing sth. or making plans to do sth. in order to achieve a particular result （为达到某个结果而）开始做某事，着手进行
column3: e.g. He has achieved what he [[set out to do]] three years ago.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: (spoken) if sb. says they are on the case, they know about a problem and are going to try to solve it 负责处理某事；负责解决某事
column3: e.g. "We need to book a flight before it's too late." "Don't worry, I'm [[on the case]]."

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: used to say sth. is impossible for sb. to control 无法控制

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: support sb. / sth. 给予支持
column3: e.g. The president is [[lending support]] to the governor's re-election campaign.

[U] 机器人（制造与应用）学: get upset by the things other people say or do, because you think that their remarks or behaviors are directed at you in particular 因认为某人的言行针对自己而不快
column3: e.g. Don't [[take it personally]]; she is rude to everyone.
